We create web apps.

  • 3Coasts is a web application development company in the heart of New Orleans.

  • Our team designs and develops beautiful, state-of-the-art web applications.

  • Our clients are diverse, but there’s one common denominator shared between them: they need a web team who can not only run with them, but stay one step ahead.

  • Application Development

    At the end of the day, our objective is simple: build web applications that are reliable, secure, beautiful, fast, and fun. To get these bases covered on time and on budget, sharp design and elegant code are just two pillars in the foundation. Your web team needs years of experience, the flexibility to both join and lead teams, and the curiosity to constantly stay on top of newer and better technologies.

    • Drupal
    • Google Maps
    • PHP
    • Node.js
    • Mapbox
    • SASS
    • Javascript
    • jQuery
    • UI/UX Design
    • Content Development
    • Web Development
    • Graphic Design
    • CoffeeScript
    • Word Press
    • Mobile Development
    • Responsive Design
    • Git
    • MySQL
    • and more everyday

  • Strategy

    The digital arm of your business needs move in lockstep with your organization’s objectives. For a web project to be successful on all counts, we first seek a comprehensive understanding of your business and the challenges it faces. To do so, we ask a lot of questions up front. From there, we leverage technology to amplify your strengths and streamline solutions to your problems. Your goals inform every line of code we write, every step of the way.

  • Web Interface Design

    Your online presence not only has to be beautiful, intuitive, and fun--before it loses your audience’s attention--it has work on every device your audience is using, both now and into the future. On both the front and back end, we design for the ideal marriage between valedictorian, prom queen, and football captain : brains, beauty, and brawn.

    Check out some of our work below.
